
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/SavionZhang/p/16548344.html" title="发布于 2025-02-19 17:13">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">ASP.NET Core 6 基础入门系列(1) ASP.NET Core 6.0 简介</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<div id="comment_nav_orange"><strong>系列目录&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/SavionZhang/p/16426934.html" target="_blank">【已更新最新开发文章，点击查看详细】</a></strong></div>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">预备知识1：&nbsp;&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/SavionZhang/p/11229640.html" rel="noopener" target="_blank">C#5、C#6、C#7、C#8、C#9、</a><a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/SavionZhang/p/14839771.html" rel="noopener" target="_blank">C#10</a></span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">预备知识2：&nbsp;&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/SavionZhang/p/16433870.html" rel="noopener" target="_blank">.NET 对比 .NET Framework</a></span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">预备知识3：&nbsp;&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/SavionZhang/p/16433940.html" rel="noopener" target="_blank">ASP.NET Core 概述</a></span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">预备知识4：&nbsp;&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/SavionZhang/p/16434618.html" rel="noopener" target="_blank">ASP.NET Core 与 ASP.NET&nbsp;宏观对比</a></span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">预备知识5：&nbsp;&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/SavionZhang/p/16434628.html" rel="noopener" target="_blank">ASP.NET 请求处理机制</a></span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">预备知识6：&nbsp;&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/SavionZhang/p/16470554.html" rel="noopener" target="_blank">ASP.NET WebForm 页面生命周期</a></span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">预备知识7：&nbsp;&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/SavionZhang/p/16476424.html" rel="noopener" target="_blank">ASP.NET MVC 简介&nbsp;</a></span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">预备知识8：&nbsp;&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/SavionZhang/p/16481208.html" rel="noopener" target="_blank">ASP.NET MVC 路由及执行过程解析</a></span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">预备知识9：&nbsp;&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/SavionZhang/p/16483805.html" rel="noopener" target="_blank">ASP.NET MVC 请求处理流程</a></span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">预备知识10：<a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/zh-cn/aspnet/core/release-notes/aspnetcore-3.1?view=aspnetcore-3.1" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">ASP.NET Core 3.1 新增功能</a>&nbsp;</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">预备知识11：<a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/zh-cn/aspnet/core/release-notes/aspnetcore-5.0?view=aspnetcore-5.0" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">ASP.NET Core 5.0 新增功能&nbsp;</a></span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">预备知识12：<a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/zh-cn/aspnet/core/release-notes/aspnetcore-6.0?view=aspnetcore-6.0" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">ASP.NET Core 6.0 新增功能</a></span></li>
</ul>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">　　ASP.NET Core 6.0 是 .NET6 内置的一个开源跨平台框架，于2021-11-8日随.NET6一起正式发布。它主要用于构建基于云的现代互联网连接应用程序，如Web应用程序、物联网应用程序和移动后端服务应用程序。ASP.NET Core应用程序运行在.NET Core 内核上，它是一个免费的、跨平台的、开源的应用程序运行时。其架构旨在为部署到云端或在本地运行的应用程序提供优化的开发框架。它由模块化组件组成，开销最小，因此在构建解决方案时保持灵活性。开发者可以开发和部署ASP.NET Core应用程序在Windows、Mac和Linux上跨平台运行。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">通过下面三幅图可以了解到.NET6的超强功能与优越的性能</span></p>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">ASP.NET Core 架构</span></li>
</ul>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px"><img src="https://img2022.cnblogs.com/blog/142275/202207/142275-20220720092243959-2081405225.png" alt=""></span></p>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">.NET 微服务和容器化</span></li>
</ul>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px"><img src="https://img2022.cnblogs.com/blog/142275/202207/142275-20220720092128342-1714831997.png" alt=""></span></p>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">.NET6性能</span></li>
</ul>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px"><img src="https://img2022.cnblogs.com/blog/142275/202207/142275-20220720092432234-898204311.png" width="1000"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">.NET6 已发布了7个 Preview 版本，官方链接分别为：</span></p>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">.NET6 Preview</span>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px"><a href="https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/announcing-net-6-preview-1" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/announcing-net-6-preview-1</a></span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px"><a href="https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/announcing-net-6-preview-2" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/announcing-net-6-preview-2</a></span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px"><a href="https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/announcing-net-6-preview-3" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/announcing-net-6-preview-3</a></span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px"><a href="https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/announcing-net-6-preview-4" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/announcing-net-6-preview-4</a></span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px"><a href="https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/announcing-net-6-preview-5" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/announcing-net-6-preview-5</a></span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px"><a href="https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/announcing-net-6-preview-6" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/announcing-net-6-preview-6</a></span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px"><a href="https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/announcing-net-6-preview-7" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/announcing-net-6-preview-7</a></span></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">.NET6 Preview ASP.NET Core 更新</span></li>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px"><a href="https://devblogs.microsoft.com/aspnet/asp-net-core-updates-in-net-6-preview-1" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://devblogs.microsoft.com/aspnet/asp-net-core-updates-in-net-6-preview-1</a></span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px"><a href="https://devblogs.microsoft.com/aspnet/asp-net-core-updates-in-net-6-preview-2" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://devblogs.microsoft.com/aspnet/asp-net-core-updates-in-net-6-preview-2</a></span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px"><a href="https://devblogs.microsoft.com/aspnet/asp-net-core-updates-in-net-6-preview-3" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://devblogs.microsoft.com/aspnet/asp-net-core-updates-in-net-6-preview-3</a></span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px"><a href="https://devblogs.microsoft.com/aspnet/asp-net-core-updates-in-net-6-preview-4" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://devblogs.microsoft.com/aspnet/asp-net-core-updates-in-net-6-preview-4</a></span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px"><a href="https://devblogs.microsoft.com/aspnet/asp-net-core-updates-in-net-6-preview-5" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://devblogs.microsoft.com/aspnet/asp-net-core-updates-in-net-6-preview-5</a></span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px"><a href="https://devblogs.microsoft.com/aspnet/asp-net-core-updates-in-net-6-preview-6" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://devblogs.microsoft.com/aspnet/asp-net-core-updates-in-net-6-preview-6</a></span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px"><a href="https://devblogs.microsoft.com/aspnet/asp-net-core-updates-in-net-6-preview-7" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://devblogs.microsoft.com/aspnet/asp-net-core-updates-in-net-6-preview-7</a></span></li>
</ul>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<p>.NET6正式发布官方文档说明： <a href="https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/announcing-net-6/" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/announcing-net-6/</a></p>
<p>.NET6 是微软.NET平台大统一之后的第一个 LTS 长期支持版本。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2022.cnblogs.com/blog/142275/202207/142275-20220720091853252-71788875.png" width="800"></p>
</blockquote>
<blockquote>
<p>.NET Core 开源地址：<a href="https://github.com/dotnet/aspnetcore" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/dotnet/aspnetcore</a></p>
<p><img src="https://img2022.cnblogs.com/blog/142275/202207/142275-20220720091639687-677427097.png" width="800" loading="lazy"></p>
</blockquote>
<div id="comment_nav_green"><strong>.NET 6 中 ASP.NET Core 的主要工作计划</strong></div>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">.NET 6 使用开放式规划流程，因此您可以在基于<a href="https://themesof.net/" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">Blazor 的 themesof.net</a>网站上查看为此版本计划的所有主要主题。除了这些顶级主题之外，我们还希望为平台提供许多用户驱动的改进。您可以在我们的<a href="https://github.com/dotnet/aspnetcore/issues/27883" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">路线图</a>问题中找到为 .NET 6 中的 ASP.NET Core 计划的主要工作列表。以下是为 .NET 6 版本计划的一些主要 ASP.NET Core 功能的示例：</span></p>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px"><strong><a href="https://github.com/dotnet/aspnetcore/issues/18486" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">热重载</a>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</strong>快速更新正在运行的应用程序的 UI 和代码，而不会丢失应用程序状态，以获得更快、更高效的开发人员体验。</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px"><strong><a href="https://github.com/dotnet/aspnetcore/issues/27724" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">微 API</a>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</strong>用更少的代码和程序简化构建 API 端点。</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px"><strong><a href="https://github.com/dotnet/aspnetcore/issues/27888" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">单文件发布</a></strong>&nbsp; &nbsp; 构建小型、独立、高性能的应用程序和服务。</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px"><strong><a href="https://github.com/dotnet/aspnetcore/issues/5466" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">WebAssembly 提前 (AoT) 编译</a></strong>&nbsp; &nbsp; 在发布时将 Blazor WebAssembly 应用程序中的 .NET 代码直接编译到 WebAssembly，以显着提高运行时性能。</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px"><strong><a href="https://github.com/dotnet/aspnetcore/issues/27887" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">更新的单页应用 (SPA) 支持</a></strong>&nbsp; &nbsp; 更新 ASP.NET Core 中的 SPA 集成，以便与最新的现代前端 JavaScript 框架无缝协作。</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px"><strong><a href="https://github.com/dotnet/aspnetcore/issues/27217" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">Blazor 混合桌面应用程序</a></strong>&nbsp; &nbsp; 结合<a href="https://blazor.net/" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">Blazor</a>和<a href="https://devblogs.microsoft.com/xamarin/the-new-net-multi-platform-app-ui-maui/" rel="noopener nofollow">.NET 多平台应用程序 UI</a>的<a href="https://blazor.net/" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">优点</a>来构建跨平台混合桌面应用程序。</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px"><strong><a href="https://github.com/dotnet/aspnetcore/issues/15271" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">HTTP/3</a></strong>&nbsp; &nbsp; 在 ASP.NET Core 支持的服务器中添加对 HTTP/3 和 QUIC 的支持。</span></li>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<p>ASP.NET Core 6 中断性变更列表 <a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/zh-cn/dotnet/core/compatibility/6.0#aspnet-core" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://docs.microsoft.com/zh-cn/dotnet/core/compatibility/6.0#aspnet-core </a></p>
</blockquote>
<div id="comment_nav_green"><strong>.NET 6 Preview 1 中的 ASP.NET Core 新增功能</strong></div>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px; color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">支持 IAsyncDisposable MVC【重要】</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">DynamicComponent</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">ElementReference在相关组件上公开的输入</span></li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/aspnet/Announcements/issues/444" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">可为空的引用类型注释</span></a></li>
</ul>
<div id="comment_nav_green"><strong>.NET 6 Preview 2 中的 ASP.NET Core 新增功能</strong></div>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">Razor 编译器更新为使用源代码生成器</span></li>
</ul>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px"><img src="https://img2020.cnblogs.com/blog/142275/202106/142275-20210626162600973-1679769609.png" alt="" width="585" height="324" loading="lazy"></span></p>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">支持 Blazor 中的自定义事件参数</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">MVC 视图和 Razor 页面的 CSS 隔离</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">从祖先组件推断组件通用类型</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">在 Blazor 应用中保留预渲染状态</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">SignalR - 可为空的注释</span></li>
</ul>
<div id="comment_nav_green"><strong>.NET 6 Preview 3 中的 ASP.NET Core 新增功</strong></div>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px; color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">较小的 SignalR、Blazor 服务器和 MessagePack 脚本【重要】</span></li>
</ul>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px"><img src="https://img2020.cnblogs.com/blog/142275/202106/142275-20210626163416153-878951441.png" alt="" width="685" height="104" loading="lazy"></span></p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://stackexchange.github.io/StackExchange.Redis/Profiling_v2.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">启用 Redis 分析会话</span></a></li>
</ul>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>services.AddStackExchangeRedisCache(options =&gt;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
{
    options.ProfilingSession </span>= () =&gt; <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">new</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> ProfilingSession();
})</span></pre>
</div>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px; color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">HTTP/3 端点 TLS 配置</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px; color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">初始 .NET 热重载支持</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px; color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">Razor 编译器不再生成单独的视图程序集</span></li>
</ul>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">Razor 编译器以前使用两步编译过程，该过程生成一个单独的视图程序集，其中包含应用程序中定义的生成的视图和页面 (.cshtml)。生成的类型是公共的并且在<code class=" prettyprinted">AspNetCore</code>命名空间下。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">我们现在更新了 Razor 编译器以将视图和页面类型构建到主项目程序集中。这些类型现在在命名空间中默认生成。此更改提高了构建性能，支持单文件部署，并使这些类型能够参与 .NET 热重载。<code class=" prettyprinted"><span class="kwd">internal<span class="pln">&nbsp;<span class="kwd">sealed</span></span></span></code><code class=" prettyprinted">AspNetCoreGeneratedDocument</code></span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2020.cnblogs.com/blog/142275/202106/142275-20210626165650526-1477166506.jpg" alt="" width="716" height="281" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">有关此更改的其他详细信息，请参阅GitHub 上的相关<a href="https://github.com/aspnet/Announcements/issues/459" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">公告</a>问题。</span></p>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">IIS 中的卷影复制</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">SignalR C++ 客户端的 Vcpkg 端口</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px; color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">减少空闲 TLS 连接的内存占用【重要】</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">从板中取出 SlabMemoryPool</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">BlazorWebView WPF 和 Windows 窗体控件</span></li>
</ul>
<div id="comment_nav_green"><strong>.NET 6 Preview 4 中的 ASP.NET Core 新增功能<strong>【重要】</strong></strong></div>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px; color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">引入最少的 API【重要】</span></li>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">在.NET6中，我们为web应用程序中的托管和路由引入了最少的API。这为使用.NET构建第一个web应用程序的新开发人员以及希望构建小型微服务和HTTPAPI的现有客户打开了大门。这些简化的API以较少的代价提供了ASP.NET MVC的好处。</span></li>
</ul>
</ul>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">在操作系统的【所有应用】中找到VS2022的快捷目录，展开找到<strong>“Developer Command Promet for VS2022”工具</strong></span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2020.cnblogs.com/blog/142275/202106/142275-20210627205500468-457299444.png" width="600" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">输入以下命令即可创建新的ASP.NET Core 6.0 空 Web 应用程序，并且引入最少的API</span></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>dotnet <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">new</span> web -o MinApi</pre>
</div>
<p><img src="https://img2020.cnblogs.com/blog/142275/202106/142275-20210627205145064-99985324.png" width="600" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2020.cnblogs.com/blog/142275/202106/142275-20210627205210643-1122799031.png" width="600" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;<img src="https://img2020.cnblogs.com/blog/142275/202106/142275-20210627210159268-1629313513.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;<img src="https://img2020.cnblogs.com/blog/142275/202106/142275-20210627210214885-1500692762.png" width="600" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">运行结果如下：</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2020.cnblogs.com/blog/142275/202106/142275-20210627210813918-645734683.png" width="600" loading="lazy"></p>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px; color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">异步流【重要】</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px; color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">HTTP 日志中间件【重要】</span>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-size: 14px"><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">有关如何使用 HTTP 日志记录的更多信息，请查看</span><a style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;" href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/core/fundamentals/http-logging" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">HTTP 日志记录文档</a><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">。</span></span></li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px; color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">在新项目中使用 Kestrel 作为默认启动配置文件【重要】</span></li>
</ul>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px; color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"><img src="https://img2020.cnblogs.com/blog/142275/202106/142275-20210627214321414-1226044123.png" width="600" loading="lazy"></span></p>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px"><code class=" prettyprinted">IConnectionSocketFeature</code></span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">改进的单页应用 (SPA) 模板</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">.NET 热重载更新</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">Razor 组件中的通用类型约束</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">Blazor 错误边界</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">Blazor WebAssembly 提前 (AOT) 编译</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">.NET MAUI Blazor 应用程序</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px; color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">其他性能改进【重要】</span></li>
</ul>
<div id="comment_nav_green"><strong>.NET 6 Preview 5 中的 ASP.NET Core 新增功能</strong></div>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">.NET 热重载更新 dotnet watch</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">ASP.NET Core SPA 模板更新到 Angular 11 和 React 17</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">在 SVG foreignObject 元素中使用 Razor 语法</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">为Action和RenderFragment组件参数指定 null</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">通过运行时重新链接减少 Blazor WebAssembly 下载大小</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px; color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">在 Json.NET 输出格式化程序中写入磁盘之前可配置的缓冲区阈值【重要】</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">用于更好地过滤 Kestrel 日志的子类别</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">更快地获取和设置 HTTP 标头</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">IIS 的可配置未消耗传入缓冲区大小</span></li>
</ul>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 14px">.NET6已于2021年11月8号正式发布，完整介绍请参考：<a href="https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/announcing-net-6/" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/announcing-net-6/</a></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<div id="comment_nav_orange"><strong>系列目录&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <a title="已更新最新开发文章，点击查看详细" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/SavionZhang/p/16426934.html" target="_blank">【已更新最新开发文章，点击查看详细】</a></strong></div>
</div>
<div id="MySignature" role="contentinfo">
    <div style="margin-bottom:15px;border: 1px solid #ececec; padding: 5px 10px; background: #DFFFA3; color: #555555; padding: 15px 20px 15px 30px;font-size: 14px; font-family: 'Microsoft Yahei'; clear: both;">
<p><strong>成在管理，败在经验；嬴在选择，输在不学！&nbsp; 贵在坚持！</strong></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;<img src="https://img2020.cnblogs.com/blog/142275/202105/142275-20210511151906789-1718967820.png"><strong>个人作品</strong></p>
<p>&nbsp; &nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp; &nbsp;<b> BIMFace.SDK.NET</b></p>
<p>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;开源地址：<a href="https://gitee.com/NAlps/BIMFace.SDK" target="_blank">https://gitee.com/NAlps/BIMFace.SDK</a></p>
<p>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;系列博客：<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/SavionZhang/p/11424431.html" target="_blank">https://www.cnblogs.com/SavionZhang/p/11424431.html</a></p>
<p>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;系列视频：<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/SavionZhang/p/14258393.html" target="_blank">https://www.cnblogs.com/SavionZhang/p/14258393.html</a></p>

<div style="margin-top:15px;margin-bottom:15px;border: 1px solid #ececec; background: #DFFFA3; color: #555555; padding: 15px 20px 15px 30px;font-size: 14px; font-family: 'Microsoft Yahei'; clear: both;">
<p>&nbsp;<img src="https://img2020.cnblogs.com/blog/142275/202105/142275-20210511143255073-1133010989.png"><strong>技术栈</strong></p>
<p>&nbsp; &nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;1、AI、DeepSeek、MiniMax、通义千问</p>
<p>&nbsp;2、Visual Studio、.NET Core/.NET、MVC、Web API、RESTful API、gRPC、SignalR、Java、Python</p>
<p>&nbsp;3、jQuery、Vue.js、Bootstrap、ElementUI</p>
<p>&nbsp;4、数据库：分库分表、读写分离、SQLServer、MySQL、PostgreSQL、Redis、MongoDB、ElasticSearch、达梦DM、GaussDB、OpenGauss</p>
<p>&nbsp;5、架构：DDD、ABP、SpringBoot、jFinal</p>
<p>&nbsp;6、环境：跨平台、Windows、Linux</p>
<p>&nbsp;7、移动App：Android、IOS、HarmonyOS、微信小程序、钉钉、uni-app、MAUI</p>
<p>&nbsp;8、分布式、高并发、云原生、微服务、Docker、CI/CD、DevOps、K8S；Dapr、RabbitMQ、Kafka、RPC、Elasticsearch</p>
<p>&nbsp; &nbsp;</p>
<p><strong>欢迎关注作者头条号<a href="https://www.toutiao.com/c/user/token/MS4wLjABAAAAbk25bkHtt-JXKOYM-UMlAriUxIAiyJZvE-qxTwnNe4c/" target="_blank"> 张传宁IT讲堂</a>，获取更多IT文章、视频等优质内容。</strong></p>
</div>

<div style="border: 1px solid #ececec; padding: 5px 10px; background: #4bacc6; color: #ffffff;font-size: 14px; font-family: 'Microsoft Yahei';">
    <p>出处：www.cnblogs.com/SavionZhang</p>
	<p>作者：张传宁 &nbsp;&nbsp;技术顾问、培训讲师、微软MCP、系统架构设计师、系统集成项目管理工程师、科技部创新工程师。</p>
    <p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;专注于企业级通用开发平台、工作流引擎、自动化项目(代码)生成器、SOA 、DDD、 云原生(Docker、微服务、DevOps、CI/CD）；PDF、CAD、BIM 审图等研究与应用。</p>
	<p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;多次参与电子政务、图书教育、生产制造等企业级大型项目研发与管理工作。</p>
	<p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;熟悉中小企业软件开发过程：可行调研、需求分析、架构设计、编码测试、实施部署、项目管理。通过技术与管理帮助中小企业实现互联网转型升级全流程解决方案。</p>
    <p><span style="font-size: 14px; color: #ffffff; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p>
